dict.acceptation: 大的，重的；大块的，大量的；魁伟的，结实的；大规模的；

sent.orig: Massive rate cuts and massive borrowing may bring about new problems.
sent.trans: 大幅降息和大举借贷也许会带来新的问题。

sent.orig: The changes he is seeking on massive are massive andinvolve a huge infusion of government foundsfunds.
sent.trans: 他正在寻求的改变是巨大的，同时需要大笔的资金。

sent.orig: The epic battles of the Second War ranged from large-scale naval skirmishes to massive aerial dogfights.
sent.trans: 第二次兽人战争从海上的零星冲突一直延伸到大规模的空中混战。

sent.orig: He put his arms round her massive waist and kissed her wet steamy lips.
sent.trans: 他用双手搂住她那巨大的腰，吻了吻她那潮湿的带水汽的嘴唇。

sent.orig: One reason some people spend hours at a computer is to play massive online role-playing games.
sent.trans: 有些人花许多时间在电脑上玩在线角色扮演游戏。
